hero_title: Where your love story meets effortless planning.
hero_text: I offer refined partial wedding planning with warm, personal guidance and thoughtful design add‑ons — so you stay in creative control while I make the journey simple and seamless.
services_sub: Elegant guidance, modern structure, and beautiful details.
gallery_sub: A glimpse of the aesthetic: clean lines, soft textures, romantic detail.
contact_sub: Tell me a bit about your day and I’ll follow up within 48 hours.

testimonials.quote: “Calm, organized, and so kind. Our day felt effortless.”
“Her design eye pulled everything together — it finally felt like us.”
“We loved being in control while still having a pro handle the details.”

dont_do: No vendor selection on your behalf

approach_steps.title: Listen & Learn
approach_steps.text: We begin with a relaxed consult to understand your story, style, and priorities.

approach_steps.title: Curate & Recommend
approach_steps.text: I research vendors that fit your vision and budget and present clear, thoughtful options.

approach_steps.title: You Choose
approach_steps.text: You make the decisions. I’m here with guidance and clarity, never pressure.

approach_steps.title: Coordinate & Refine
approach_steps.text: Once selected, I liaise with your vendors, shape timelines, and keep everything aligned.

approach_steps.title: Polish the Details
approach_steps.text: Optional design add‑ons ensure your celebration looks as graceful as it feels.
